item.title: CVE-2024-31938|2024-04-15T09:23:01.722Z -- Themeinwp -- NewsXpress
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Themeinwp NewsXpress.This issue affects NewsXpress: from n/a through 1.0.7.
